root.name: Law & Order: Dead on the Money
root.description: A Wall Street stock broker is found dead in Central Park, where she had been jogging. You play as Detective Lennie Briscoe's partner as you gather evidence and interview witnesses, but time is not on your side, you need to quickly build a case and hand it over to the district attorney's office. You then play as Serena Southerlyn's assistant as you try and convince the jury that the one being charged is indeed guilty. Characters from the TV series include detective Lennie Briscoe, Assistant D.A Serena Southerlyn and Lieutenant Anita Van Buren (all seen on the games cover).
